member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_AlreadyBoundOrSyncHandle
member.summary: 'handle' has already been bound to the thread pool, or was not opened for asynchronous I/O.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_InvalidHandle
member.summary: Handle has been disposed or is invalid.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_NativeOverlappedWrongBoundHandle
member.summary: 'overlapped' was not allocated by this ThreadPoolBoundHandle instance.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_NativeOverlappedReused
member.summary: NativeOverlapped cannot be reused for multiple operations.
